mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_qm_typical_case
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_qm_typical_case t left outer join t_qm_workform_pool t1 ON t.TOUCH_ID = t1.WRKFM_ID
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_qm_typical_case t left outer join t_qm_voice_pool t1 ON t.TOUCH_ID = t1.TOUCH_ID left outer join t_qm_voice t2 ON t.TOUCH_ID = t2.TOUCH_ID
order by ${orderByClause}
